Title: 24: Redemption
Writer: Joel Surnow (creator), Robert Cochran (creator), Howard Gordon
Actors: Kiefer Sutherland, Cherry Jones, Bob Gunton, Colm Feore
Plot: Former Federal Agent Jack Bauer confronts African dictator Benjamin Juma, whose forces have been ordered to capture the children Bauer oversees for malicious military training.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 15 nominations.
